title: Menu Items
content:

Menu Items

 

  • Menu Items
    • Filters
    • Create a Menu Item
    • Editing a Menu Item
    • Details View
    • Deleting a Menu Item
      • Field Description

The menu maintenance screen will allow the user to configure new menu maintenance for different menu roots and items.

 

Filters

Following is the list of filters available on the screen:

 

  • Display Name
  • Group Name
  • Label Key
  • Menu ID
  • Menu Resource ID
  • Menu URL
  • Menu URL Parameters

Create a Menu Item

 

To create new menu items:

 

  1. Select Menu > Menu Maintenance > Menu Items
  2. Enter the filter criteria and click Apply. You will see the records on the list pane.
  3. Click Create to view the Menu window.
  4. Enter the Menu ID for the menu item.
  5. Enter the Group Name type of menu item.
  6. Enter the Label Key for the menu item display name for localization.
  7. Enter the Menu Resource ID associated with the menu item.
  8. Enter the Display Name for the menu item.
  9. Enter the Menu URL Parameters.
  10. Enter the Menu URL.
  11. Click Save.

Editing a Menu Item

To edit  menu:

 

Swipe-out List

  1. Select Menu > Menu Maintenance > Menu Items
  2. Enter the filter criteria and click Apply. You will see the records on the list pane.
  3. Select the required item location menu record. Swipe-out the menu on the required record card and select Edit.
  4. In the Menu window, modify the required fields.
  5. Click Save.

Edit View

  1. Select the required menu record card. The action buttons are displayed in the footer section.
  2. Click Edit to view the Menu window, modify the required fields.
  3. Click Save.

Details View

 

Swipe Out List

  • Select the required menu record. Swipe-out the menu on the required record card and select Details.
  • In the Menu wizard, you can view the details of the menu items.

Details View

  • Select the required record card and you can view the action buttons displayed on the footer section.
  • Click Details from the action button to view details of menu items.

 

Deleting a Menu Item

 

The menu records can be deleted by following one of the below procedures:

 

Swipe-out List

  1. Select Menu > Menu > Menu Maintenance > Menu Items
  2. Enter the filter criteria and click Apply. You will see the records on the list pane.
  3. Swipe-out menu on the required record card and select Delete.
  4. A confirmation pop-up prompts as 'This action will delete selected Menu Item'.
  5. Click Yes to delete the menu.

Delete

  1. Select the required record card. The footer section with action buttons is displayed.
  2. Select Delete.
  3. A confirmation pop-up prompts as 'This action will delete selected Menu Item'.
  4. Click Yes to delete the menu.
Field Description

Following are the field descriptions of the attributes available on the screen.

 

Field

 

Description

 
Menu ID

The unique key for the menu item.

Group Name

The type of menu item.
Label Key The label key for the menu item displays name localization. The localization is maintained in the common-UI-façade. 
Menu Resource ID This is the resource associated with the menu item. If the user does not have access to this resource then the menu item will not be visible to the user.
Display Name The display name for a menu item.
Menu URL Parameters This is where we specify menu parameters that control the execution behavior of the screen.
Menu URL The Menu URL.

 

Action Buttons

Following are the action buttons available on the screen.

 

Select All Rows Selects all the rows of records on the screen.
Export Exports the list of menu item attributes, the file will be downloaded onto your system. View Export for more information.
Create Opens the  Menu window. 
Deselect Clears the selected records.
Edit Opens the relevant Menu window to edit the records.
Details Opens the relevant Menu window to view and edit the records.
